name: sudachipy

about.summary: Python version of Sudachi, the Japanese Morphological Analyzer
Python version of Sudachi, the Japanese Morphological Analyzer

raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  version: 0.6.10

package:
  name: sudachipy
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/s/sudachipy/sudachipy-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b8910a4610de98b2c3cb6dc3362fea93e3ba5059f1eb445a68baa9585278f31b

build:
  number: 1
  script:
    - cargo-bundle-licenses --format yaml --output THIRDPARTY.yml
    - ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  python:
    entry_points:
      - sudachipy=sudachipy.command_line:main

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - ${{ compiler("c") }}
    - ${{ compiler("rust") }}
    - cargo-bundle-licenses
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then: 
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
  host:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - wheel
    - setuptools-rust
    - pip
  run:
    - python

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - sudachipy
      pip_check: true
  - script: sudachipy --help

about:
  summary: Python version of Sudachi, the Japanese Morphological Analyzer
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
    - THIRDPARTY.yml
  homepage: https://github.com/WorksApplications/sudachi.rs/tree/develop/python

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - apmorton
    - danielnachun

about.summary: Python version of Sudachi, the Japanese Morphological Analyzer
